effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
